Html:
Hello guys,

Just started using LinqToSharepoint for SP2007.  Its really nice to have strongly typed linq queries as opposed to CAML to work with.  Thanks for this :)

 

I can see that CreatedBy and ModifiedBy are not generated by SPMetal.  Seems to be because they are not part of a content type.

I've seen a few blogs on how to make this info available in sharepoint 2010.  For us poor souls stuck in 2007, is there a way to accomplish this without too much pain?

 

Many thanks,

Mike
